content: Hello, I need help fixing my heater, is this XYZ services?
Hello! You’ve reached XYZ Home Services. May I have your name please?
Oh sorry, I think I called the wrong number. I’m looking for a local heating repair company for my neighborhood.

I understand, no problem! Since this number is not the right one for your needs, I will mark this as wrong number for our records. If you ever need plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services in our area, feel free to reach out. Take care!
